typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceStream
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		reported_date = date,
		reported_year_week = year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SourceStream lookup(SourceStream@country == CountryLookup@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
